item.title: CodeForces 1324F - Maximum White Subtree
item.description: 好题！ Solution The solution consists of two DFS, first DFS is to calculate $sub_i$: the max difference of the subgraph in subtree of $i$. Note that we treat the graph as a rooted tree, so the subtree means the part that is lower than node $i$. This is pretty naive DFS. The second dfs is to find the answer of each vertex. Since we only considered the contribution of the subtree, we need to add the contribution of other part the graph. How to find this contribution? We always get the answer of higher nodes first.
